about_the_game:
Hello players,

This DLC is a THANK YOU for all your support on Chromosome Evil, we really appreciate all your honest reviews & feedback so we want to give something back.

We noticed that some of you downloaded trainers from third-party sites that can harm your computers so we decided to create our own trainer/cheat mode for you at the cost of NOTHING, yes, this DLC costs nothing, it is free & safe.

WARNING:
- the game will lose some of the magic if you play with cheat mode so we highly recommend trying the non-cheat versions first
- if you play in cheat mode you will not unlock any achievements
- some features may cause the game to break if used in excess

Cheat mode options:
- morale option
- Aggro option
- resources
- level up characters
- instant heal
- spawn monsters per click (special feature)
- Action points options

INSTRUCTIONS: In order to play the cheat mode you need to:
1. download the first free DLC(the one with weapon customization mechanic)
2. run the cheat DLC one time for download
3. open the game folder location and open cheat.exe

We are now working to make the cheat DLC launch on the page but we encounter some confusion in depots and we await for Steam support response to fix this issue.

Thank you, players!
